dc:title: On Pilgrimage - February 1977
dc:creator: Dorothy Day

dc:description.P: Reflects on the dignity of work, manual labor, and her childhood chores. Talks of reading the novels of Chaim Potok and decries continuing anti-Semitism.

dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 194 1977-02-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
